TopicTitle: Do terrain scatters affect GPU or CPU?

Articles.Content: Just curious, I have plenty of GPU power to spare and was considering turning these on if they only utilized my gfx card.
I'd be interested in an answer too (I've got a RAM bottleneck) but I suspect it will be something along the lines of "a little bit of everything" (meaning CPU, GPU and RAM).

I think it's mostly CPU, actually. My machine has a rather nice GPU (Radeon R7 240 4Gb) but the CPU is a little lower tech (AMD 6 core 3.5GHz). Just for fun, during beta testing, I had all the scatters turned on fulll. I ended up landing a jet on a plain that had at least 10,000 trees in view. And boy oh boy did that stall my system.
